title: The game is unplayable because am dcing once every 30 seconds.
body: WinMTR shows no issues. I contacted my ISP. they said there are no issues? what is the problem. this can't be on my end. THIS DOESN'T HAPPEN WITH OTHER GAMES?. I can't play the damn game . I disconnected I counted exactly. I dced 23 times in one game. one game. People are reporting me for intentional feeding. like what am i supposed to do? Not play the game. this has been happening at random times and sometiems every game for the past 4 weeks.

replies.body: It looks like Targonsblade already offered some context on this with the provided routing.  Taking a look at it myself, it looks like you hit some pretty high ping well before ever reaching us, so it's strange that ISP suggests everything is okay.  Were you able to provide your trace to them?  Hit is up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as well, and we'll work with you individually to see if we can find any other options.  We'll get back to you.
